docs.lead_paragraph: LIKE Oscar Wilde, what she writes is but a pale imitation of what she says: her life is her art, man. She has a rare wit, Muhammad Ali reflexes, and an insatiable craving for experience at whatever the cost. She is the mistress of the put-down and the sendup, the come-on and the ...
